form.SN:
v ameriški angleščini pišemo
fulfill, fulfills
.

sense.def:
To fulfil a promise or hope
pomeni izpolniti obljubo ali upe.

seg.quote: They failed to fulfil their promises to revive the economy.
I had fulfilled many of my ambitions.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
fulfils someone
ali kadar nekdo
fulfils oneself
, je nekdo srečen in zadovoljen zaradi tistega, kar dela.

seg.quote: This way of life no longer fulfils the individuals concerned.
The children gain if both parents are living fulfilled lives.

sense.def:
To fulfil a role or function
pomeni storiti tisto, kar zahteva določena vloga ali položaj.

seg.quote: He could no longer fulfil his function as breadwinner for the family.
Helicopters fulfilled a variety of roles.
